pkgmetadata.longdescription: Software for constructing genetic maps in experimental crosses: full-sib, RILs, F2 and backcrosses // Analysis of molecular marker data from model (backcrosses, F2 and recombinant inbred lines) and non-model systems (i. e. outcrossing species). For the later, it allows statistical analysis by simultaneously estimating linkage and linkage phases (genetic map construction). All analysis are based on multipoint approaches using hidden Markov models.
